InstructionData.Title: Gas Injector
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias GasSensor d0 alias Pump d1
alias pressure r0 alias ratio r1 alias pp r2 define K 0.5 alias rate r4 alias cutin r5
define PPMAX 0.5
loop: l pressure GasSensor Pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioVolatiles mul pp ratio pressure sub rate PPMAX pp mul rate K rate s db Setting rate s Pump Setting rate sgtz cutin rate s Pump On cutin
yield j loop
